divs: Sighting Detailsmy fiance was outside smoking cigarettes last night outside our home in plantation, florida about 4 minutes air time from the air port when he noticed these. by the time i got my cameraphone ready i had captured about half of the lights before they disappeared into, well, into the air. the entire time these lights were int he sky - not one plane took off or landed. this was around 9:30 pm
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Plantation
There were no other sightings in Plantation on or around June 1st 2012
